name: New Balance Fresh Foam Roav Shoes - Men's
description: Sleek, stylish shoes loaded with explosive potential to level up your box jumping skills. The Fresh Foam ROAV’s sole cradles your foot, offering supple comfort and high-performance support.Ultra heel cups and supports your heel as your one the move.Bootie construction for sock-like comfort.Fresh Foam midsole cushioning keep these kicks feeling great all-day.Full ground contact outsole provides serious traction.
